content.title: Enterprise Store in iOS
content.body:
For building and publishing an app in the release mode, you must meet the following platform-specific prerequisites:

  • If you build the app for the iOS in the Release mode, you must provide the Mobile Provision, .P12 certificate, P12 password, and the Development method. To provide these details, navigate to Project Settings > Native > iPhone/iPad. For more details on iOS configurations, click here.
  • If you build the app for Android in Release mode, you must provide the Android signing details. To do so, go to Project Settings > Native > Android Mobile/Tablet. For more details on Android signing details, click here.


For information on how to publish the app to the Enterprise App Store in Release mode for iOS and Android, refer Iris User Guide.
